column4: I'm running ubuntu 8.04, any ideas why avant doesnt work? seems to load for a sec then close out? could it be because this is a vbox guest?
yes i think awn need compiz or similar
there are other docks which don't use effects
i can't remember which need 3d and whcih don't... they use it for transparency etc... here is a recent article about linux docks http://www.linuxhaxor.net/2008/10/15/the-state-of-linux-docks/
